page.title: 14A CHILD'S DAY : SHEFFIELD
page.content: I get up at 7 a.m, put the stereo on and have cornflakes or biscuits for breakfast. I feed my pet rabbits and birds before setting off for{school.}I meet my friends and play games while waiting for lessons to begin.My favorite game is{'spot',}where we kick a ball at a brick wall in turns. At lunch time I sometimes visit the Community Farm at the bottom of our school field. I like to watch yhe animals. On other days I play{'hide & {seek'}in the school grounds. At twenty past three I go home where Mum has tea ready for me. Afterwards I go out until 7 p.m. and then I go in to watch T.V. until nine, when I go up to listen to the radio in my bedroom for a couple of hours. {Craig May :age 10 {Acres Hill School.
